TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RelationalQueryContext extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryContext

summary.para: The principal data structure used by a compiled relational query during execution.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.
